page.title: 12THE WOODS NEWTON ST.CYRES
page.content: Much of the south of the area is covered by woods. {About 30 years ago}Mr.Quicke,who owns most of the woodland areas,{replanted {the land with conifers,}though some deciduous trees remain. The woods which are mostly on the high ground,{dominate the block. {Deer roam the forests and wild life {abounds. There is a{gamekeeper}who now lives in Exeter. Ordinance survey maps of 1905 show that the{woodlands still cover much {the same area now but the type of tree {has changed.}Some people have {regretted}the change from deciduous to conifer, but it appears that the {reasons are financial. Villagers and the school use the woods with permission.
